metaTags.title: Page title - max 60 chars, include brand and keyword
metaTags.description: Meta description - max 160 chars, call to action

technicalSeo.sitemap: XML sitemap at /sitemap.xml listing all important pages
technicalSeo.robots: robots.txt at root to control crawler access
technicalSeo.canonical: Prevent duplicate content with canonical URLs
technicalSeo.structuredData: JSON-LD schema for rich snippets in search results

googleSearchConsole.step3: Verify ownership via DNS, HTML file, or meta tag
googleSearchConsole.step5: Monitor index coverage and fix any issues

principles: Clear, structured content with headers and bullet points
FAQ sections that AI models can reference
tips: AI models prefer concise, factual content
Use the brand name consistently throughout
Define what the product IS in the first paragraph

deepfishSpecific.brandMessaging: AI is deep; we can go there.
